message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. This is a great deal, as the product is worth much more to me. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product! While $9000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11000. This still offers you a great deal, and it's closer to a price that works for me. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $10500. This is my final offer, as it's getting close to my minimum. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $10250?
